flawed_nl_solution:
Three years ago, his sons were 16 - 3 = <<16-3=13>>13 years old.
Three years ago, Beau was 13 + 13 + 13 = <<13+13+13=39>>39 years old.
Today, Beau is 39 + 3 = <<39+3=47>>47 years old.
#### 47

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 42, not 47. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
